root.message: The COVERAGE field for indicator 9-2-2, translated into en
root.data:
Data availability

Description:

Data is available in ILOSTAT for around 170 countries and territories.

Time series:

Data for this indicator is available as of 2000 in the UN Global SDG Database, but longer time series are available in ILOSTAT.

Disaggregation:

This indicator can be disaggregated by sex, occupation, age, region and others.
